content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I terminated the negotiation because the price was not acceptable to Peter Schmidt.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, the exact number would have been 840 Euros per month. However, since we did not reach an agreement, the final price remains uncertain.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not reach an agreement and I had to terminate the negotiation, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 1.
name: Peter Schmidt
